column2: out of action since late October
column3: is repatriated and sent to a hospital in Birmingham.

column1: * 1959 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Naomi Mitchison.
* 2002 - The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring (video game) is released in the EU for Xbox
* 2003 - The Lord of the Rings: War of the Ring is released in North America.
* 2004 - David Salos A Gateway to Sindarin is published.
* 2005 - The Lord of the Rings: Tactics is released in North America.
* 2011 - The Lord of the Rings: War in the North is released in Northern Europe.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon. They reach the Pools of Ivrin and see Túrin.
